textBeforeTable: Typical Physical Properties - Fluid loss control agent. - Suspension agent. - Viscosifier.   Application  CMC HV is sodium Carboxy Methyl Cellulose which used for reducing fluid loss with supplementary increasing viscosity. Specially suitable for low-solid muds.   Product Description CMC  H.V
textAfterTable: Recommended Treatment  Add 0.5-2 lb/bbl.   Source Imported Packaging  25 Kg multi-ply bags with PE liner palletized and shrink-wrapped. Marked on: Name of manufacturer, Batch No. and Production date.   Safety Handling
